attributes.additional_details: I think that the government should ban this tax as it is unethical and robs people of their assets and possessions.
attributes.background: Stop inheritance tax, as it is robbery from the people of this country, and that it is completely unethical. Stopping inheritance tax will increase the wealth of people in the country, increasing the quality of life for all people, and for their future generations.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Abolish inheritance tax
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703787
